column3: Removed references to the blockchain size in #5225\n
You can just update your branch and force push (git push -f) it to github to update a pull request; no need to create a new one.\n
Sorry, but I'm a GitHub noob :)\n

Can we somehow avoid mentioning a number here? Especially something as precise as '23'. It's kind of pointless and I'm sure we'll forget to update it every time, and if we do it results in commit spam.\n
